skills.name: Soul Shepherd

skills.desc:
Swaps HP with an ally. 

If this Champion's HP is equal to or higher than the target's after the swap, fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 40%, places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, and places a [Block Damage] buff on the target ally for 1 turn. If this Champion's HP is lower than the target's after the swap, fills the target's Turn Meter by 40%, places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on them for 2 turns, and a places a [Block Damage] buff on this Champion for 1 turn. Also places two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on this Champion for 1 turn.
skills.name: Uncanny Transfer

skills.desc:
Fully heals the ally with the lowest HP whenever this Champion is killed. 

Heals all allies by 20% of their MAX HP and fills their Turn Meters by 15% whenever this Champion is revived.
skills.name: Gravewalker [P]
